sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: *(ippi/as o( kalo/s te kai\ sofo/s: w(s dia\ xro/nou h(mi=n kath=ras ei)s ta\s *)aqh/nas.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p:
ou) ga sxolh/, w)= *sw/krates. h( ga *)=hlis o(/tan ti de/htai diapra/casqai pro/s tina tw=n po/lewn, a)ei\ e)pi\ prw=ton e)me\ e)/rxetai tw=n politw=n ai(roume/nh presbeuth/n, h(goume/nh dikasth
 kai\ a)/ggelon i(kanw/taton ei)=nai tw=n lo/gwn oi(\ a)
 para\ tw=n po/lewn e(ka/stwn le/gwntai. polla/kis me
 ou)=n kai\ ei)s a)/llas po/leis e)pre/sbeusa, plei=sta de\ kai\ peri\ plei/stwn kai\ megi/stwn ei)s th
 *lakedai/mona: dio\ dh/, o(\ su\ e)rwta=|s, ou) qami/zw ei)s tou/sde tou\s to/pous.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
toiou=ton me/ntoi, w)= *(ippi/a, e)/sti to\ th=| a)lhqei/a| sofo/n te kai\ te/leion a)/ndra ei)=nai. su\ ga kai\ i)di/a| i(kano\s ei)= para\ tw=n ne/wn polla\ xrh/mata lamba/nwn e)/ti plei/w w)felei=n w(=n lamba/neis, kai\ au)= dhmosi/a| th
 sautou= po/lin i(kano\s eu)ergetei=n, w(/sper xrh\ to
 me/llonta mh\ katafronh/sesqai a)ll' eu)dokimh/sein e)n toi=s polloi=s. a)ta/r, w)= *(ippi/a, ti/ pote to\ ai)/tion o(/ti oi( palaioi\ e)kei=noi, w(=n o)no/mata mega/la le/getai e)pi\ sofi/a|, *pittakou= te kai\ *bi/antos kai\ tw=n a)mfi\ to
 *milh/sion *qalh=n kai\ e)/ti tw=n u(/steron me/xri *)anacago/rou, w(s h)\ pa/ntes h)\ oi( polloi\ au)tw=n fai/nontai a)pexo/menoi tw=n politikw=n pra/cewn;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ti/ d' oi)/ei, w)= *sw/krates, a)/llo ge h)\ a)du/natoi h)=san kai\ ou)x i(kanoi\ e)ciknei=sqai fronh/sei e)p' a)mfo/tera, ta/ te koina\ kai\ ta\ i)/dia;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
a)=r' ou)=n pro\s *dio/s, w(/sper ai( a)/llai te/xnai e)pidedw/kasi kai\ ei)si\ para\ tou\s nu=n dhmiourgou\s oi( palaioi\ fau=loi, ou(/tw kai\ th
 u(mete/ran th
 tw=n sofistw=n te/xnhn e)pidedwke/nai fw=men kai\ ei)=nai tw=n a)rxai/wn tou\s peri\ th
 sofi/an fau/lous pro\s u(ma=s;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: pa/nu me\n ou)=n o)rqw=s le/geis.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
ei) a)/ra nu=n h(mi=n, w)= *(ippi/a, o( *bi/as a)nabioi/h, ge/lwt' a)
 o)/floi pro\s u(ma=s, w(/sper kai\ to
 *dai/dalo/n fasin oi( a)ndriantopoioi/, nu=n ei) geno/menos toiau=t' e)rga/zoito oi(=a h)=n a)f' w(=n tou)/nom' e)/sxen, katage/laston a)
 ei)=nai.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: e)/sti me\n tau=ta, w)= *sw/krates, ou(/tws w(s su\ le/geis: ei)/wqa me/ntoi e)/gwge tou\s palaiou/s te kai\ prote/rous h(mw=n prote/rous te kai\ ma=llon e)gkwmia/zein h)\ tou\s nu=n, eu)labou/menos me\n fqo/non tw=n zw/ntwn, fobou/menos de\ mh=nin tw=n teteleuthko/twn.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
kalw=s ge su/, w)= *(ippi/a, o)noma/zwn te kai\ dianoou/menos, w(s e)moi\ dokei=s. summarturh=sai de/ soi e)/xw o(/ti a)lhqh= le/geis, kai\ tw=| o)/nti u(mw=n e)pide/dwken h( te/xnh pro\s to\ kai\ ta\ dhmo/sia pra/ttein du/nasqai meta\ tw=n i)di/wn. *gorgi/as te ga ou(=tos o( *leonti=nos sofisth\s deu=ro a)fi/keto dhmosi/a| oi)/koqen presbeu/wn, w(s i(kanw/tatos w)
 *leonti/nwn ta\ koina\ pra/ttein, kai\ e)/n te tw=| dh/mw| e)/docen a)/rista ei)pei=n, kai\ i)di/a| e)pidei/ceis poiou/menos kai\ sunw
 toi=s ne/ois xrh/mata polla\ h)rga/sato kai\ e)/laben e)k th=sde th=s po/lews: ei) de\ bou/lei, o( h(me/teros e(tai=ros *pro/dikos ou(=tos polla/kis me
 kai\ a)/llote dhmosi/a| a)fi/keto, a)ta ta\ teleutai=a e)/nagxos a)fiko/menos dhmosi/a| e)k *ke/w le/gwn t' e)n th=| boulh=| pa/nu hu)doki/mhsen kai\ i)di/a| e)pidei/ceis poiou/menos kai\ toi=s ne/ois sunw
 xrh/mata e)/laben qaumasta\ o(/sa. tw=n de\ palaiw=n e)kei/nwn ou)dei\s pw/pote h)ci/wsen a)rgu/rion misqo
 pra/casqai ou)d' e)pidei/ceis poih/sasqai e)n pantodapoi=s a)nqrw/pois th=s e(autou= sofi/as: ou(/tws h)=san eu)h/qeis kai\ e)lelh/qei au)tou\s a)rgu/rion w(s pollou= a)/cion ei)/h. tou/twn d' e(ka/teros ple/on a)rgu/rion a)po\ sofi/as ei)/rgastai h)\ a)/llos dhmiourgo\s a)f' h(=stinos te/xnhs: kai\ e)/ti pro/teros tou/twn *prwtago/ras.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p:
ou)de
 ga/r, w)= *sw/krates, oi)=sqa tw=n kalw=n peri\ tou=to. ei) ga ei)dei/hs o(/son a)rgu/rion ei)/rgasmai e)gw/, qauma/sais a)/n: kai\ ta\ me
 a)/lla e)w=, a)fiko/menos de/ pote ei)s *sikeli/an, *prwtago/rou au)to/qi e)pidhmou=ntos kai\ eu)dokimou=ntos kai\ presbute/rou o)/ntos polu\ new/teros w)
 e)n o)li/gw| xro/nw| pa/nu ple/on h)\ penth/konta kai\ e(kato
 mna=s h)rgasa/mhn, kai\ e)c e(no/s ge xwri/ou pa/nu smikrou=, *)inukou=, ple/on h)\ ei)/kosi mna=s: kai\ tou=to e)lqw
 oi)/kade fe/rwn tw=| patri\ e)/dwka, w(/ste e)kei=non kai\ tou\s a)/llous poli/tas qauma/zein te kai\ e)kpeplh=xqai. kai\ sxedo/n ti oi)=mai e)me\ plei/w xrh/mata ei)rga/sqai h)\ a)/llous su/nduo ou(/stinas bou/lei tw=n sofistw=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
kalo/n ge, w)= *(ippi/a, le/geis kai\ me/ga tekmh/rion
sofi/as th=s te seautou= kai\ tw=n nu=n a)nqrw/pwn pro\s tou\s a)rxai/ous o(/son diafe/rousi. tw=n ga prote/rwn [peri\ *)anacago/rou le/getai] pollh\ a)maqi/a kata\ to
 so
 lo/gon. tou)nanti/on ga *)anacago/ra| fasi\ sumbh=nai h)\ u(mi=n: kataleifqe/ntwn ga au)tw=| pollw=n xrhma/twn katamelh=sai kai\ a)pole/sai pa/nta—ou(/tws au)to
 a)no/hta sofi/zesqai—le/gousi de\ kai\ peri\ a)/llwn tw=n palaiw=n e(/tera toiau=ta. tou=to me
 ou)=n moi dokei=s kalo
 tekmh/rion a)pofai/nein peri\ sofi/as tw=n
nu=n pro\s tou\s prote/rous, kai\ polloi=s sundokei= o(/ti to
 sofo
 au)to
 au(tw=| ma/lista dei= sofo
 ei)=nai: tou/tou d' o(/ros e)sti
 a)/ra, o(\s a)
 plei=ston a)rgu/rion e)rga/shtai. kai\ tau=ta me
 i(kanw=s e)xe/tw: to/de de/ moi ei)pe/, su\ au)to\s po/qen plei=ston a)rgu/rion h)rga/sw tw=n po/lewn ei)s a(\s a)fiknh=|; h)\ dh=lon o(/ti e)k *lakedai/monos, oi(=per kai\ pleista/kis a)fi=cai;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ou) ma\ to\n *di/a, w)= *sw/krates.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: pw=s fh/|s; a)ll' e)la/xiston;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ou)de\n me\n ou)=n to\ para/pan pw/pote.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: te/ras le/geis kai\ qaumasto/n, w)= *(ippi/a. kai/ moi ei)pe/: po/teron h( sofi/a h( sh\ ou)x oi(/a tou\s suno/ntas au)th=| kai\ manqa/nontas ei)s a)reth\n belti/ous poiei=n;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: kai\ polu/ ge, w)= *sw/krates.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)lla\ tou\s me\n *)inuki/nwn u(ei=s oi(=o/s te h)=sqa a)mei/nous poih=sai, tou\s de\ *spartiatw=n h)duna/teis;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: pollou= ge de/w.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)lla\ dh=ta *sikeliw=tai me\n e)piqumou=sin a)mei/nous gi/gnesqai, *lakedaimo/nioi d' ou)/;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: pa/ntws ge/ pou, w)= *sw/krates, kai\ *lakedaimo/nioi.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)=r' ou)=n xrhma/twn e)ndei/a| e)/feugon th\n sh\n o(mili/an;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ou) dh=ta, e)pei\ i(kana\ au)toi=s e)stin.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ti/ dh=t' a)\n ei)/h o(/ti e)piqumou=ntes kai\ e)/xontes xrh/mata, kai\ sou= duname/nou ta\ me/gista au)tou\s w)felei=n, ou) plh/rh se a)rguri/ou a)pe/pemyan; a)ll' e)kei=no, mw=n mh\ *lakedaimo/nioi sou= be/ltion a)\n paideu/seian tou\s au(tw=n pai=das; h)\ tou=to fw=men ou(/tw, kai\ su\ sugxwrei=s;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ou)d' o(pwstiou=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
po/teron ou)=n tou\s ne/ous ou)x oi(=o/s t' h)=sqa pei/qein e)n *lakedai/moni w(s soi\ suno/ntes ple/on a)
 ei)s a)reth
 e)pididoi=en h)\ toi=s e(autw=n, h)\ tou\s e)kei/nwn pate/ras h)duna/teis pei/qein o(/ti soi\ xrh\ paradido/nai ma=llon h)\ au)tou\s e)pimelei=sqai, ei)/per ti tw=n u(e/wn kh/dontai; ou) ga/r pou e)fqo/noun ge toi=s e(autw=n paisi
 w(s belti/stois gene/sqai.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ou)k oi)=mai e)/gwge fqonei=n.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)lla\ mh\n eu)/nomo/s g' h( *lakedai/mwn.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: pw=s ga\r ou)/;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: e)n de/ ge tai=s eu)no/mois po/lesin timiw/taton h( a)reth/.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: su\ de\ tau/thn paradido/nai a)/llw| ka/llist' a)nqrw/pwn e)pi/stasai.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: o( ou)=n ka/llist' e)pista/menos i(ppikh\n paradido/nai a)=r' ou)k a)\n e)n *qettali/a| th=s *(ella/dos ma/lista timw=|to kai\ plei=sta xrh/mata lamba/noi, kai\ a)/lloqi o(/pou tou=to spouda/zoito;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ei)ko/s ge.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p:
o( dh\ duna/menos paradido/nai ta\ plei/stou a)/cia maqh/mata ei)s a)reth
 ou)k e)n *lakedai/moni ma/lista timh/setai kai\ plei=sta e)rga/setai xrh/mata, a)
 bou/lhtai, kai\ e)n a)/llh| po/lei h(/tis tw=n *(ellhni/dwn eu)nomei=tai; a)ll' e)n *sikeli/a|, w)= e(tai=re, oi)/ei ma=llon kai\ e)n *)inukw=|; tau=ta peiqw/meqa, w)= *(ippi/a; e)a
 ga su\ keleu/h|s, peiste/on.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ou) ga\r pa/trion, w)= *sw/krates, *lakedaimoni/ois kinei=n tou\s no/mous, ou)de\ para\ ta\ ei)wqo/ta paideu/ein tou\s u(ei=s.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: pw=s le/geis; *lakedaimoni/ois ou) pa/trion o)rqw=s pra/ttein a)ll' e)camarta/nein;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ou)k a)\n fai/hn e)/gwge, w)= *sw/krates.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ou)kou=n o)rqw=s a)\n pra/ttoien be/ltion a)lla\ mh\ xei=ron paideu/ontes tou\s ne/ous;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: o)rqw=s: a)lla\ cenikh\n pai/deusin ou) no/mimon au)toi=s paideu/ein, e)pei\ eu)= i)/sqi, ei)/per tis a)/llos e)kei=qen xrh/mata e)/laben pw/pote e)pi\ paideu/sei, kai\ e)me\ a)\n labei=n polu\ ma/lista—xai/rousi gou=n a)kou/ontes e)mou= kai\ e)painou=sin— a)ll', o(\ le/gw, ou) no/mos.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: no/mon de\ le/geis, w)= *(ippi/a, bla/bhn po/lews ei)=nai h)\ w)feli/an;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ti/qetai me\n oi)=mai w)feli/as e(/neka, e)ni/ote de\ kai\ bla/ptei, e)a\n kakw=s teqh=| o( no/mos.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ti/ de/; ou)x w(s a)gaqo\n me/giston po/lei ti/qentai to\n no/mon oi( tiqe/menoi; kai\ a)/neu tou/tou meta\ eu)nomi/as a)du/naton oi)kei=n;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: a)lhqh= le/geis.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: o(/tan a)/ra a)gaqou= a(ma/rtwsin oi( e)pixeirou=ntes tou\s no/mous tiqe/nai, nomi/mou te kai\ no/mou h(marth/kasin: h)\ pw=s le/geis;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: tw=| me\n a)kribei= lo/gw|, w)= *sw/krates, ou(/tws e)/xei: ou) me/ntoi ei)w/qasin a(/nqrwpoi o)noma/zein ou(/tw.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: po/teron, w)= *(ippi/a, oi( ei)do/tes h)\ oi( mh\ ei)do/tes;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: oi( polloi/.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: ei)si\n d' ou(=toi oi( ei)do/tes ta)lhqe/s, oi( polloi/;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ou) dh=ta.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)lla\ mh/n pou oi(/ g' ei)do/tes to\ w)felimw/teron tou= a)nwfeleste/rou nomimw/teron h(gou=ntai th=| a)lhqei/a| pa=sin a)nqrw/pois: h)\ ou) sugxwrei=s;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: nai/, sugxwrw=, o(/ti ge th=| a)lhqei/a|.

sp.p: ou)kou=n e)/stin te kai\ e)/xei ou(/tws w(s oi( ei)do/tes h(gou=ntai;

sp.p:
e)/sti de/ ge *lakedaimoni/ois, w(s su\ fh/|s, w)felimw/teron th
 u(po\ sou= pai/deusin, cenikh
 ou)=san, paideu/esqai ma=llon h)\ th
 e)pixwri/an.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: kai\ a)lhqh= ge le/gw.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: kai\ ga\r o(/ti ta\ w)felimw/tera nomimw/tera/ e)sti, kai\ tou=to le/geis, w)= *(ippi/a;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ei)=pon ga/r.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: kata\ to\n so\n a)/ra lo/gon toi=s *lakedaimoni/wn u(e/sin u(po\ *(ippi/ou paideu/esqai nomimw/tero/n e)stin, u(po\ de\ tw=n pate/rwn a)nomw/teron, ei)/per tw=| o)/nti u(po\ sou= plei/w w)felhqh/sontai.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: a)lla\ mh\n w)felhqh/sontai, w)= *sw/krates.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: paranomou=sin a)/ra *lakedaimo/nioi ou) dido/ntes soi xrusi/on kai\ e)pitre/pontes tou\s au(tw=n u(ei=s.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: sugxwrw= tau=ta: dokei=s ga/r moi to\n lo/gon pro\s e)mou= le/gein, kai\ ou)de/n me dei= au)tw=| e)nantiou=sqai.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: parano/mous me\n dh/, w)= e(tai=re, tou\s *la/kwnas eu(ri/skomen, kai\ tau=t' ei)s ta\ me/gista, tou\s nomimwta/tous dokou=ntas ei)=nai. e)painou=si de\ dh/ se pro\s qew=n, w)= *(ippi/a, kai\ xai/rousin a)kou/ontes poi=a; h)\ dh=lon dh\ o(/ti e)kei=na a(\ su\ ka/llista e)pi/stasai, ta\ peri\ ta\ a)/stra te kai\ ta\ ou)ra/nia pa/qh;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ou)d' o(pwstiou=n: tau=ta/ ge ou)d' a)ne/xontai.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)lla\ peri\ gewmetri/as ti xai/rousin a)kou/ontes;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: ou)damw=s, e)pei\ ou)d' a)riqmei=n e)kei/nwn ge, w(s e)/pos ei)pei=n, polloi\ e)pi/stantai.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: pollou= a)/ra de/ousin peri/ ge logismw=n a)ne/xesqai/ sou e)pideiknume/nou.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: pollou= me/ntoi nh\ *di/a.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)lla\ dh=ta e)kei=na a(\ su\ a)kribe/stata e)pi/stasai a)nqrw/pwn diairei=n, peri/ te gramma/twn duna/mews kai\ sullabw=n kai\ r(uqmw=n kai\ a(rmoniw=n;

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: poi/wn, w)gaqe/, a(rmoniw=n kai\ gramma/twn;

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)lla\ ti/ mh/n e)stin a(\ h(de/ws sou a)krow=ntai kai\ e)painou=sin; au)to/s moi ei)pe/, e)peidh\ e)gw\ ou)x eu(ri/skw.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: peri\ tw=n genw=n, w)= *sw/krates, tw=n te h(rw/wn kai\ tw=n a)nqrw/pwn, kai\ tw=n katoiki/sewn, w(s to\ a)rxai=on e)kti/sqhsan ai( po/leis, kai\ sullh/bdhn pa/shs th=s a)rxaiologi/as h(/dista a)krow=ntai, w(/st' e)/gwge di' au)tou\s h)na/gkasmai e)kmemaqhke/nai te kai\ e)kmemelethke/nai pa/nta ta\ toiau=ta.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: nai\ ma\ *di/', w)= *(ippi/a, hu)tu/xhka/s ge o(/ti *lakedaimo/nioi ou) xai/rousin a)/n tis au)toi=s a)po\ *so/lwnos tou\s a)/rxontas tou\s h(mete/rous katale/gh|: ei) de\ mh/, pra/gmat' a)\n ei)=xes e)kmanqa/nwn.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p: po/qen, w)= *sw/krates; a(/pac a)kou/sas penth/konta o)no/mata a)pomnhmoneu/sw.

sp.speaker: *swkra/ths
sp.p: a)lhqh= le/geis, a)ll' e)gw\ ou)k e)neno/hsa o(/ti to\ mnhmoniko\n e)/xeis: w(/st' e)nnow= o(/ti ei)ko/tws soi xai/rousin oi( *lakedaimo/nioi a(/te polla\ ei)do/ti, kai\ xrw=ntai w(/sper tai=s presbu/tisin oi( pai=des pro\s to\ h(de/ws muqologh=sai.

sp.speaker: *(ippi/as
sp.p:
kai\ nai\ ma\ *di/', w)= *sw/krates, peri/ ge e)pithdeuma/twn kalw=n kai\ e)/nagxos au)to/qi hu)doki/mhsa dieciw
